duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide peer-to-peer education and in-servicing to nurses, physicians, and hospital staff to support medical device implementations.
Assess customer-specific education needs and collaborate with staff to deliver a positive educational experience.
Utilize clinical nursing expertise to answer questions and address concerns with the medical device.
Provide updates, reports, and valuable feedback to the client during and after in-service assignments.

education_certification.credential: RN Degree - Associates required, Bachelor's preferred
Active and Unrestricted RN license required
